00002  * CCarmack.cpp

00005  *      Author: gerstrong

00007 
00008 #include "CCarmack.h"
00009 #include "../../CLogFile.h"
00010 #include "../../StringUtils.h"
00011 
00012 CCarmack::CCarmack()
00013 {
00014  // TODO Auto-generated constructor stub
00015 }
00016 
00017 #define NEARTAG     0xA7
00018 #define FARTAG      0xA8
00019 #define WORDSIZE    2
00020 
00021 #define COUNT       i
00022 #define TAG         i+1
00023 #define OFFSET      i+2
00024 
00025 #define OFFSET_MSB  i+3 // Fartag Offset
00026 #define OFFSET_LSB  i+2
00027 
00028 #define COPY_BYTE1  j
00029 #define COPY_BYTE2  j+1
00030 
00031 /**
00032  * \brief   This function expands data using carmack
00033  *      decompression algorithm
00034  * \param source pointer to the data that is compressed
00035  * \param dest pointer to the data that will be the output
00036  * \param length length of the EXPANDED data
00037  */
00038 void CCarmack::expand( std::vector<byte>& dst, std::vector<byte>& src )
00039 {
00040  uint32_t i, j, offset, length, inc;
00041 
00042  dst.clear();
00043  for( i=WORDSIZE; i<src.size(); i+=inc )
00044  {
00045   switch( src.at(TAG) )
00046   {
00047   case NEARTAG:
00048    if( src.at(COUNT)==0x00 ) //&& src.at(OFFSET_MSB)==0x00 )
00049    {
00050     dst.push_back(NEARTAG);
00051     inc = WORDSIZE+1;
00052    }
00053    else
00054    {
00055     offset = dst.size()-(WORDSIZE*src.at(OFFSET));
00056     length = WORDSIZE*src.at(COUNT);
00057     for( j=offset; j<offset+length; j+=WORDSIZE )
00058     {
00059      // Word is already swapped in the destination vector
00060      dst.push_back(dst.at(COPY_BYTE1));
00061      dst.push_back(dst.at(COPY_BYTE2));
00062     }
00063    }
00064    inc = WORDSIZE+1;
00065    break;
00066   case FARTAG:
00067    if( src.at(COUNT)==0x00 )  //&& src.at(OFFSET_MSB)==0x00 )
00068    {
00069     dst.push_back(FARTAG);
00070     inc = WORDSIZE+1;
00071    }
00072    else
00073    {
00074     offset = WORDSIZE*((src.at(OFFSET_MSB)<<8)+src.at(OFFSET_LSB));
00075     length = WORDSIZE*src.at(COUNT);
00076     for( j=offset; j<offset+length; j+=WORDSIZE )
00077     {
00078      if( j+src.at(COUNT)<dst.size() )
00079      {
00080       // Word is already swapped in the destination vector
00081       dst.push_back(dst.at(COPY_BYTE1));
00082       dst.push_back(dst.at(COPY_BYTE2));
00083      }
00084      else
00085      {
00086       g_pLogFile->textOut("ERROR Offset overflow offset="+ itoa(j) +", actual size="+itoa(dst.size())+"\n");
00087       return;
00088      }
00089     }
00090    }
00091    inc = WORDSIZE+2;
00092    break;
00093   default:
00094    // Swap the bytes for the word
00095    dst.push_back(src.at(TAG));
00096    dst.push_back(src.at(COUNT));
00097    inc = WORDSIZE;
00098    break;
00099   }
00100  }
00101 }
